def printVertically(self, s):
        array =  s.split();
        maxx = max([len(i) for i in array])
        pre_transfrom = [i + ' ' * (maxx - len(i)) for i in array]
        line = ''.join([i[k] for k in range(0, maxx) for i in pre_transfrom])
        res = [line[i:i+len(pre_transfrom)] for i in range(0, len(line), len(pre_transfrom))]
        res = [i.rstrip() for i in res if i.strip()]
        return res
